Plot: Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.
Title: Queen Margot
Writer: Alexandre Dumas père (novel), Danièle Thompson (scenario & adaptation), Patrice Chéreau (scenario & adaptation), Danièle Thompson (dialogue)
Actors: Isabelle Adjani, Daniel Auteuil, Jean-Hugues Anglade, Vincent Perez
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 12 nominations.
